archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0070
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to align payment renewal dates for multiple plans I have access to with the relevant role profiles in my self service, so that I can have all my payments coming out on the same day

properties.value: Assumption: change is made per one plan, not in bulk? To be discussed if "bulk" is necessary based on possibilities. For Comarch this could be just a number of single calls anyway. Customer needs to pay pro-rata for the alignment. Not sure if the data bundle should be proportional as well?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
